channel.title: Ux on Newsboat Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Ux on Newsboat Blog

item.title: Designing for the First 5 Seconds
item.description:
People decide to stay in the first five seconds. Clarity beats cleverness in that window.

One headline, one action, one promise. Then deliver on it without interruption.

Earn the second five seconds, and the rest gets easy.

item.title: The Small Loop
item.description:
Ship the smallest useful cut. Let real use decide what grows next.

Logs are for the future you. Tell the story so you can fix it fast.

The best workflows are boring and reliable. That reliability creates room for creative work.
